completed_steps.summary: Classified as monolith with 1 part: web (React 19 PWA + Vite 7.3 + Supabase + Zustand 5.0 + Tailwind 4.1 + Zod 4.3)

Found 15 existing doc sources: README, CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, tests/README.md, PRD (11 shards), Architecture (5), UX Design (11), Epics (8), implementation artifacts, test design, TEA docs, CI workflows (7), 12 SQL migrations, previous docs (8 sections)
Tech stack: React 19.2.4 + TS 5.9.3 + Vite 7.3.1 + Zustand 5.0.11 + Supabase 2.93.3 + Tailwind 4.1.17 + Zod 4.3.6 + Vitest 4.0.17 + Playwright 1.58.2

YOLO mode: 4 parallel sub-agents completed exhaustive scan. Agent A: architecture+state+source-tree (33 files, 5099 lines), Agent B: api-reference+data-models (25 files, 2801 lines), Agent C: component-inventory (9 files, 1211 lines), Agent D: project-overview+development-guide (23 files, 3086 lines)
Master index.md updated with links to all 90 documentation files across 8 sections
Validation: all 90 linked files verified present, 0 missing, 0 incomplete markers found
Workflow finalized. Total output: 90 markdown files, 12,495 lines across 8 documentation sections
